00030         {
00031 public:
00032         ~CCardGameDealer();
00033

00036

00039         void DealCardsL(TDesC8& aCards);
00040         
00041 protected:
00042         // pure virtuals to be implemented by derived classes
00043         // these are from CCardGameBase but we dont want them
